title: Various Data Analysis Problems
description: Work with dictionaries and CSV data, use comprehensions of lists, sets, and dictionaries, explore the Collections module, and tackle a data analysis challenge with Chicago Transit Authority data in Python.

meta.title: Various Data Analysis Problems
meta.description: Work with dictionaries and CSV data, use comprehensions of lists, sets, and dictionaries, explore the Collections module, and tackle a data analysis challenge with Chicago Transit Authority data in Python.
meta.keywords: Python, data analysis, dictionaries, comprehensions, Collections module

verify.hint: Make sure you've imported and used the Counter and defaultdict classes from the collections module.

verify.hint: Make sure you've performed the analysis to answer all four questions about the Chicago Transit Authority data.
